CreateApplication.name: CreateApplication
CreateApplication.description: Grants permission to create an application

CreateConfigurationProfile.name: CreateConfigurationProfile
CreateConfigurationProfile.description: Grants permission to create a configuration profile

CreateDeploymentStrategy.name: CreateDeploymentStrategy
CreateDeploymentStrategy.description: Grants permission to create a deployment strategy

CreateEnvironment.name: CreateEnvironment
CreateEnvironment.description: Grants permission to create an environment

CreateHostedConfigurationVersion.name: CreateHostedConfigurationVersion
CreateHostedConfigurationVersion.description: Grants permission to create a hosted configuration version

DeleteApplication.name: DeleteApplication
DeleteApplication.description: Grants permission to delete an application

DeleteConfigurationProfile.name: DeleteConfigurationProfile
DeleteConfigurationProfile.description: Grants permission to delete a configuration profile

DeleteDeploymentStrategy.name: DeleteDeploymentStrategy
DeleteDeploymentStrategy.description: Grants permission to delete a deployment strategy

DeleteEnvironment.name: DeleteEnvironment
DeleteEnvironment.description: Grants permission to delete an environment

DeleteHostedConfigurationVersion.name: DeleteHostedConfigurationVersion
DeleteHostedConfigurationVersion.description: Grants permission to delete a hosted configuration version

GetApplication.name: GetApplication
GetApplication.description: Grants permission to view details about an application

GetConfiguration.name: GetConfiguration
GetConfiguration.description: Grants permission to view details about a configuration

GetConfigurationProfile.name: GetConfigurationProfile
GetConfigurationProfile.description: Grants permission to view details about a configuration profile

GetDeployment.name: GetDeployment
GetDeployment.description: Grants permission to view details about a deployment

GetDeploymentStrategy.name: GetDeploymentStrategy
GetDeploymentStrategy.description: Grants permission to view details about a deployment strategy

GetEnvironment.name: GetEnvironment
GetEnvironment.description: Grants permission to view details about an environment

GetHostedConfigurationVersion.name: GetHostedConfigurationVersion
GetHostedConfigurationVersion.description: Grants permission to view details about a hosted configuration version

ListApplications.name: ListApplications
ListApplications.description: Grants permission to list the applications in your account

ListConfigurationProfiles.name: ListConfigurationProfiles
ListConfigurationProfiles.description: Grants permission to list the configuration profiles for an application

ListDeploymentStrategies.name: ListDeploymentStrategies
ListDeploymentStrategies.description: Grants permission to list the deployment strategies for your account

ListDeployments.name: ListDeployments
ListDeployments.description: Grants permission to list the deployments for an environment

ListEnvironments.name: ListEnvironments
ListEnvironments.description: Grants permission to list the environments for an application

ListHostedConfigurationVersions.name: ListHostedConfigurationVersions
ListHostedConfigurationVersions.description: Grants permission to list the hosted configuration versions for a configuration profile

ListTagsForResource.name: ListTagsForResource
ListTagsForResource.description: Grants permission to view a list of resource tags for a specified resource

StartDeployment.name: StartDeployment
StartDeployment.description: Grants permission to initiate a deployment

StopDeployment.name: StopDeployment
StopDeployment.description: Grants permission to stop a deployment

TagResource.name: TagResource
TagResource.description: Grants permission to tag an appconfig resource.

UntagResource.name: UntagResource
UntagResource.description: Grants permission to untag an appconfig resource.

UpdateApplication.name: UpdateApplication
UpdateApplication.description: Grants permission to modify an application

UpdateConfigurationProfile.name: UpdateConfigurationProfile
UpdateConfigurationProfile.description: Grants permission to modify a configuration profile

UpdateDeploymentStrategy.name: UpdateDeploymentStrategy
UpdateDeploymentStrategy.description: Grants permission to modify a deployment strategy

UpdateEnvironment.name: UpdateEnvironment
UpdateEnvironment.description: Grants permission to modify an environment

ValidateConfiguration.name: ValidateConfiguration
ValidateConfiguration.description: Grants permission to validate a configuration
